description: This PHP script processes an AJAX request to change a user's password. It retrieves configuration info from the request, verifies the old password by querying device settings, and updates the password if verification succeeds. It then returns a JSON response indicating the success or failure of the password change.

methods.name: setStr
methods.description: Sets a string value in device configuration settings (assumed from context).

methods.name: getStr
methods.description: Retrieves a string value from device configuration settings (assumed from context).
